headline: PPG named among Foundry’s Computerworld Best Places to Work in IT for eighth year
summary: PITTSBURGH, December 09, 2025--PPG (NYSE: PPG) today announced that it has been named among the "Best Places to Work in Information Technology (IT) in 2026" by Foundry’s Computerworld. It is PPG’s eighth appearance on the list, which celebrates companies that provide their IT workforce with meaningful engagement opportunities, stimulating challenges and comprehensive benefits and compensation.

headline: PPG (PPG) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Pullback and Rebound
summary: PPG Industries (PPG) has been drifting lower this year, but the pullback contrasts with steady revenue and profit growth. This naturally raises the question of whether the market is overlooking its fundamentals. See our latest analysis for PPG Industries.
